main.name: Ohanu Riches Kelechi
main.description: I am a software engineer and I use react js, node js, mongoDB, Restful APIs and so many other technologies out there . This project is my portfolio website that can be used to see my works and book me for projects and works
main.bio: I am a software engineer with more than 4 years experience. I graduated from Imo state university with a BSc in computer science. I have industry based experience having worked for Aptech Computer Education As a Web development faculty from 2017 to 2019. I proceeded to Decagon where I obtained the skills of a software engineer. can work Remotely and can take on projects to finish in a specified time.
main.contactmessage: You need a project done, you need a teacher to put you through, you have a remote work for myself or you have a question for me, You can contact me using the form below.

resume.skillmessage: Here are the languages and skills which i have acquired over the years. Up to date with the current industry demands.

education.description: Bachelor of science in computer science. Gained skills in Mathematics Also.
Got hands on web development skills during my IT days. Gain skills also in C#, Java and Python

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: vast and hands on organizational knowledge on using  Vanilla Javascript, MongoDB, c#, RestFul API, Agile Methodology and so on in building a simple and ppowerful nocode Application. Mentoring 3 Devs in the said language and task.
